Create Procedure  [dbo].[$PSP_xx$] 
As
Set NoCount On
Begin 
	/*
		Yazan	: $USER$
		Tarih	: $DATE$
		Açıklama:
	*/
    Begin Try
		Declare
        
    End Try 
    Begin Catch	
        Declare @ITObjectName NVarchar(126);
        Set @ITObjectName = OBJECT_NAME(@@PROCID);
        Execute SP15_GenerateError @ITObjectName;
    End Catch
End
Go
